Trade/Device Name(s): NATtrol Vaginal Panel External Run Controls
NATtrol BD MAX Vaginal Panel External Controls
Regulation Name(s): Assayed Quality Control Material For Clinical Microbiology Assays
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BD Vaginal Panel for BD MAX System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ZeptoMetrix NATtrol BD MAX Vaginal Panel External Controls serving as assayed quality control material for monitoring nucleic acid testing procedures on the BD MAX System
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use as assayed quality control material to monitor performance of in vitro diagnostic laboratory nucleic acid testing procedures for qualitative detection of panel targets on BD Vaginal Panel for BD MAX System; not intended to replace manufacturer controls
